item.description:
Good things do come up at the last minute. Who said you can't have a relaxing Thursday night?
Let's go see the cool new exhibition at the ICA on Thursday night for free then walk next door to Anthony's Pier 4 on the waterfront for a delicious 3 courses meal dinner for a really good deal. We are talking about fancy seafood, filet mignon, awesome deserts, provocative contemporary arts, and sit back to see the sunset on the harbor!

Cost: ICA = Free on Thursday night
Anthony's Pier 4 - 3 courses meal = $33.10 + tip

When & Where: Meet at the front lobby of the ICA at 6:30pm. Dinner is at 7:30pm.

Restaurant week: http://www.restaurant...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: ICA & Restaurant week dinner!
